## BJH017

```{r BJH017-data-load}

bjh17_data <- read_csv(path(here(), './data/ieeg_behave/BJH017_raw_behave.csv'), col_types = cols(X1 = col_double(),
                                                                                              Subject = col_character(),
                                                                                              Trial = col_character(),
                                                                                              Lives = col_double(),
                                                                                              Trial_on_off = col_double(),
                                                                                              TrialType = col_double(),
                                                                                              Time = col_double(),
                                                                                              Sample = col_double(),
                                                                                              GhostLocation = col_double(),
                                                                                              UserLocation = col_double(),
                                                                                              Direction = col_double(),
                                                                                              Biscuit1 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit2 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit3 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit4 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit5 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Attack = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Chase = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Eaten = col_double(),
                                                                                              Score = col_double()))


```

```{r BJH021-data-prep}

# clean Biscuits #
bjh17_data_clean <- clean_bci_data(bjh17_data, 2000)

# create distance df #
bjh17_data_distance <- create_distance_df_bci(bjh17_data_clean)

# task vars df #
bjh17_all_vars_df <- get_across_task_variables_bci(bjh17_data_clean)

# Write to Csv #
write_csv(bjh17_data_clean, path(here(), './data/ieeg_behave/BJH017_cleaned_behave_data.csv'))

```

```{r tmp}

turn_times <- bjh17_data_distance %>%
  select(subject, trial_numeric, distance_to_ghost, last_away, away_choice, trial_time, TrialType, points_remaining) %>%
  group_by(trial_numeric) %>%
  mutate(event = if_else(last_away == away_choice & away_choice != 0, 1, 0)) %>%
  mutate(turnaround_time = if_else(event == 1, trial_time, 0)) %>%
  filter(trial_time == max(turnaround_time)) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  ungroup()

turn_times %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_time)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"))

```


```{r paused-trials}

tmp <- bjh17_data %>%
  group_by(Trial) %>%
  mutate(TrialType = as.numeric(names(sort(table(TrialType),decreasing=TRUE))[1])) %>%
  select(Trial, TrialType) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(same_trial_type = c(0, diff(TrialType))) %>%
  filter(same_trial_type == 0)


```

```{r trials-no-biscuits}


bjh17_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  group_by(trial_numeric) %>%
  mutate(total_eaten = max(Eaten)) %>%
  filter(total_eaten == 0) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~trial_numeric)

no_biscuits_trials <- bjh17_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  group_by(trial_numeric) %>%
  mutate(total_eaten = max(Eaten)) %>%
  select(trial_numeric, total_eaten) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  filter(total_eaten == 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  # exclude fake trial 0 
  filter(neural_trial_numeric >= 0) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(neural_trial_numeric)



```

Other bad trials include: 1, 6,

```{r all-other-trials}


# no ghost trials
bjh17_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(TrialType >16) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_trials$neural_trial_numeric)) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~neural_trial_numeric, scales = "free_x")

# first 100 trials
bjh17_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(TrialType <= 16) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_trials$neural_trial_numeric)) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric < 100) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~neural_trial_numeric, scales = "free_x")

# 100-200 trials
bjh17_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(TrialType <= 16) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
```

```{r longest-trial}
trial_times <- bjh17_data_clean %>%
```
